alert.note: Alert for Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 19 at 12:34AM EDT until April 19 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Atlantic Coastal Cape May and Cape May. * WHEN...Until 5 AM EDT early this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May
